sentences.en: " At Tellson's banking - house at nine, " he said, with a musing face.
sentences.cn: “ 九点在台尔森银行大厦见面, ” 他想道.

sentences.en: Banking and financial services produce very high earnings, and a lot of people are trying to get onto the gravy train.
sentences.cn: 银行和金融服务行业收入很高, 很多人都想得到这种美差.

sentences.en: Banking regulators failed to clamp down until earlier this month.
sentences.cn: 银行监管机构直到本月初才开始严格管制。

sentences.en: Electronic banking may make overthe - counter transactions obsolete.
sentences.cn: 电子银行服务也许会淘汰柜台交易.

sentences.en: He possesses an extensive knowledge of banking.
sentences.cn: 他具有广博的银行业务知识.

sentences.en: He recognized Mr. Hunter as an old business acquaintance from his years in banking.
sentences.cn: 他认出亨特先生是他在银行业工作那些年里相识的生意上的老熟人.

sentences.en: In 1987, Garcia introduced legislation to nationalize Peru's banking and financial systems.
sentences.cn: 1987年，加西亚立法将秘鲁银行业和金融系统收归国有。

sentences.en: She's thinking about a career in banking.
sentences.cn: 她正在考虑从事银行业。

sentences.en: Such a merger would be the largest in US banking history, giving the two banks combined assets of some $146 billion.
sentences.cn: 这将是美国银行业历史上最大的一次合并，使两家银行的总资产达到1,460亿美元左右。

sentences.en: The island offers a wide range of offshore banking facilities.
sentences.cn: 这座岛上有很多离岸金融机构。

sentences.en: The leaflet explains how to complain to the banking ombudsman.
sentences.cn: 这份传单介绍了如何向银行意见调查官投诉。

sentences.en: The morning began fine, but now clouds are banking up.
sentences.cn: 早晨开始是晴天, 可是现在乌云密布.

sentences.en: The world of advertising is obviously less bound by convention than the world of banking.
sentences.cn: 显然，广告业比银行业更少受到惯例的束缚。

sentences.en: This is the latest in a series of shocks to the Scandinavian banking system.
sentences.cn: 这是一系列对斯堪的纳维亚银行系统的冲击中最近的一次。

sentences.en: We're banking on them lending us the money—no pun intended!
sentences.cn: 我们正指望他们借给我们钱呢—bank绝无双关之意！
